summary: This appears to be an email communication from August 10, 2019, regarding an 'M/W Activities Log' with attachments including a PDF log file. The document is part of the Bureau of Prisons records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, likely related to monitoring or activities logs for Jeffrey Epstein while in custody.

events.title: Email Regarding Activities Log
events.description: An email was sent regarding an 'M/W Activities Log' with attachments including a PDF file of the log.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC NY)
keyFacts: Document is an email dated August 10, 2019, concerning an 'M/W Activities Log'.
Attachments include a PDF file named 'MW_Lieutenant_Log.pdf' and a vcf file.
The document originates from the U.S. Department of Justice Federal Bureau of Prisons (FBOP) at MCC New York.
The email was sent shortly before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, suggesting it may relate to monitoring or activities logs for him.
